Subjects: Virgin Mary, hymns to; hymns, to Virgin Mary
_description: James Ryman, A hymn to the Virgin Mary — twelve quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Dei genitrix pia’ and burden: ‘Sancta virgo maria / Dei genitrix pia’

CULEe112.First Lines:
Haile perfecte trone of Salamonehaile flore and flease of
                    gedeon…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…But oute of drede to blis vs lededei genitrix
                    pia
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 175-6.
Greene,  Richard Leighton. 
             The Early English Carols.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1935; 2nd ed., rev., Oxford: Clarendon,
            1977: 143-4; 1977, 127-8.
